overview: The third installment of Kerrang's Video Kompilation series, featuring:  Iron Maiden - The Evil That Men Do, Whitesnake - Give Me All Your Love, Poison - Nothin' But a Good Time, Vixen - Edge of a Broken Heart, Tigertailz - Living Without You, Megadeth - Anarchy in the UK, Voivod - Tribal Convictions, Anthrax - I'm The Man, Kingdom Come - Get It On, Vow Wow - Rock Me Now, Magnum - Days of No Trust, Zodiac Mindwarp and The Love Reaction - Prime Mover, W.A.S.P. - Manimal, Great White - Save Your Love
title: Kerrang! Video Kompilation 3
